focus-erp.title: Focus ERP — Integrated Management System
focus-erp.description: Focus ERP is a comprehensive enterprise resource planning system designed to manage sales, purchasing, accounting, inventory, production, and HR in one unified platform. It supports multi-branch operations, multi-currency, and advanced reporting to improve operational efficiency and decision making.
focus-erp.features: Complete sales & procurement cycle||Integrated accounting & cost control||Inventory & manufacturing management||HR & payroll automation||Attendance integration||Flexible payroll and rewards||Comprehensive employee reports||Legal & tax compliance

hr-system.title: HR Management System
hr-system.description: A full-featured HR system to manage employees, attendance, payroll, leaves, and policies. Supports biometric integration, flexible workflows, and detailed reporting to streamline HR operations.
hr-system.features: Define earnings and deductions||Flexible work schedules and tax rules||Incentives and payroll rules||Biometric attendance integration||Department and branch management||Permissions and multi-currency support

erplite.title: ERPLite — Lightweight ERP for SMEs
erplite.description: ERPLite provides essential ERP features for small and medium businesses with fast deployment and easy-to-use interfaces. It covers invoicing, inventory, purchases, accounting, and reporting with lower cost and quick setup.
erplite.features: Multiple invoice types and payment methods||Credit limits and pricing rules||Smart alerts for stock and pricing||Linking payments to invoices||Unlimited warehouses support||Automatic posting for transactions||Customizable reports||Barcode and POS integration

e-invoicing.title: E-Invoicing & Tax Reporting
e-invoicing.description: A compliant e-invoicing solution for registering and managing invoices according to tax authority standards. Supports digital signatures, submission to tax portals, Excel import/export, and flexible integrations.
e-invoicing.features: Register electronic invoices of all types||Full compliance with tax standards||Support for digital signatures||API integration and data import/export||User-friendly review and submission||Training and support services
